title: Number of retail chains in Poland 2019 , by sector
summary: This is a bar chart representing Retail Categories in the x axis and Number of retail chains in the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
The highest Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing has 52.0 more Number of retail chains than the lowest Retail Categories Pet Care.
min_summary: This bar chart has 18 columns on the x axis representing Retail Categories, and Number of retail chains in each Retail Categories on the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Retail Categories in the x axis and Number of retail chains in the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
The highest Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing has 52.0 more Number of retail chains than the lowest Retail Categories Pet Care.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Retail Categories in the x axis and Number of retail chains in the y axis.
Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing has the highest Number of retail chains and Pet Care has the lowest Number of retail chains.
The difference of Number of retail chains between the highest and lowest Retail Categories is 52.0.
Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing is higher than any other Retail Categoriess with value 57.0, followed by , and Footwear & Leather. Down to Retail Categories Pet Care with the lowest value 5.0.
Retail Categories Toys & Games, Petrol, and Jewelry & Watches have a similar Number of retail chains that is 12.0.
The Retail Categories Pet Care has 3.18 times less Number of retail chains than average.
The Number of retail chains is 323.0 if we add up values of all Retail Categoriess.
